download_url(→ str)

Download a file from a url and place it in folder.

skpm.event_logs.download.download_url(url: str, folder: str | None = None, file_name: str | None = None) → str[source]

Download a file from a url and place it in folder.

Parameters:

  • url (str) – URL to download file from

  • folder (str, optional) – Folder to download file to. If None, use the current working directory. Defaults to None.

  • file_name (str, optional) – Name to save the file under. If None, use the basename of the URL. Defaults to None.

Returns:

Path to downloaded file

Return type:

folder (str)

skpm.event_logs.download._save_response_content(content: Iterator[bytes], destination: str) → None[source]
skpm.event_logs.download._urlretrieve(url: str, destination: str, chunk_size: int = 1024 * 32) → None[source]
